item.description:
Stanley Eze is a recent Masters graduate of computer from the University of Regina. I also have my Bachelors in computer which I obtained from Nnamdi Azikiwe University Awka.

I have several years of experience in software development and programming in general. I am well informed with most recent/trending technologies in various aspects of computer science, especially in the UX/UI design, frontend technologies and frameworks, RESP API methods and integrations etc. I have hands-on experience writing applications with Reactjs for frontend, python/Django for backends and Java for desktop.

During the course of my study, I worked extensively in various aspects of general computer programming and software development. Understanding current trends, I took some relevant courses that helped shape my skills today.

Relevant Courses; Software Development Principles, Humman Computer Communication, Data Analysis From the Internate, Artificial Intelligence, Information Visualization
